Header: Pakistani Minister of Foreign affairs to arrive in Sri Lanka
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Minister of Foreign Affairs of Pakistan, Shah Mahmood Qureshi is due to arrive in Sri Lanka tonight (December 1). The Ministry of Foreign Affairs said that the visiting Pakistani Minister of Foreign Affairs is scheduled to meet President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa, and Minister of Foreign Affairs Dinesh Gunawardena. The Ministry added that Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi is arriving in the country to extend the wishes of the Pakistani Government to President Rajapaksa. Meanwhile, the Foreign Ministry also noted that the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People’s Republic of China is also scheduled to arrive in Sri Lanka next week.
